Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.CLI.utils

Class UserHelper

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.CLI.utils.UserHelper
public class UserHelper extends Object
Class UserHelper provides all the information to the player regarding how to call an action during the turn. It can be called by entering the 'help' command during the turn. By entering the name of the action for which help is needed, this class provides an explanation of what the action do and provides also an example of how to call it.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    UserHelper(ModelView modelView, InputManager inputManager)
    Construct a UserHelper that will look to the specified model view to know what information provide to the player who request help (for example the 'MoveStudents' action is different from 2 to 3 players in terms of number of students to move).

  • Constructor Details

    • UserHelper

      public UserHelper(ModelView modelView, InputManager inputManager)
      Construct a UserHelper that will look to the specified model view to know what information provide to the player who request help (for example the 'MoveStudents' action is different from 2 to 3 players in terms of number of students to move). The specified input manager will be used to obtain the type of action that needs to be clarified to the user.
      Parameters:
      modelView - the model view used for the game
      inputManager - the input manager from which input are taken

  • Method Details

    • onHelpRequest

      public void onHelpRequest()
      Handles that help request of the user. First it requests the type of action that needs to be clarified and the prints all the information about that action.

    • printCharacterInfo

      private void printCharacterInfo(int characterId)
      Obtains (from a Json file) and prints information about a character with the specified id
      Parameters:
      characterId - the character id of which information will be printed
